mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product_opt (pno, pOption, pOptionName, pOption2, pOptionName2, pAmount, pOptionPrice, pColor) values (#{pno}, #{pOption}, #{pOptionName}, #{pOption2}, #{pOptionName2}, #{pAmount}, #{pOptionPrice}, #{pColor})
mapper.select: select distinct * from tbl_product_opt where pno=#{pno}
select pColor from tbl_product_opt where pno=#{pno};
mapper.update: update tbl_product_opt set pOption=null where pOption="없음"
update tbl_product_opt set pOption2=null where pOption2="없음"
update tbl_product_opt set pColor=null where pColor="없음"
